sentence.Network_en: She delivered a homily on the virtues of family life.
sentence.Network_cn: 她进行了一场家庭生活美德方面的说教。

sentence.Network_en: She delivered a homily on the virtues of family life.
sentence.Network_cn: 她进行了一场家庭生活美德方面的说教。

sentence.Network_en: Palm Sunday, recap Fr Mark's homily, short and quite simple but impressed in my head.
sentence.Network_cn: 圣枝主日, 重温神父马克讲道, 短期和深刻的印象很简单,但在我的脑袋.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 以h开头的英语英文单词 ... homiletics 讲道术，说教术 homily 说教,训诫 hominy 玉米粥.

基督徒结婚典礼的中英文版本_轻舟一叶_新浪博客 ... Repeat after me:（ 跟着我说） Homily（ 布道） Unity Candle（ 同心蜡烛）.
谁有英文弥撒的过程?_爱问知识人 ... GOSPEL（ 福音） HOMILY（ 讲道） PROFESSION OF FAITH（ 信经）.

list.abs: Relating to or of the nature of a homily ., 布道的 , 说教的说教性质的 , 或与此有关的.
of the names of the homilies ., 该名称的颂歌.

every western casualty , every reinforcement and every pious political homily on the " justness " and " necessity " of the war seem only to leave the mission floundering deeper and more hopelessly .每一个伤亡的西方士兵，每一次增援和每一次对战争正义性和必要性的谆谆政治说教似乎都只是把这次行动推向越陷越深、越挣扎
of the nature of a homily or sermon ., 有说教或布道特征的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from ecclesiastical Latin homilia, from Greek, 'discourse, conversation' (in ecclesiastical use, 'sermon'), from homilos 'crowd'

entry.def: A homily is a speech or piece of writing in which someone complains about the state of something or tells people how they ought to behave.

example.ex: ...a receptive audience for his homily on moral values.
example.tran: 乐于倾听他关于道德价值观的说教的观众

means.word_mean: 1. a sermon on a moral or religious topic
